entry.title: An introduction to django-oscar
entry.summary:
Description

Oscar is a Django e-commerce framework designed for flexibility. It employs a range of techniques that allow developers to customise any part of the core. In this way it can be used to capture a wide range of e-commerce requirements.

This talk will examine the key techniques used by Oscar that allow this customisation, as well as the features Oscar offers and what it can be used for.

entry.title: Oscar and the art of transactional Django applications
entry.summary:
Description

Tytu≈Ç/Topic: Oscar and the art of transactional Django applications Prelegent/Speaker: David Winterbottom

Oscar is a Django e-commerce framework designed for flexibility. Based on years of hard-earned experience, it employs a range of techniques that allow developers to customise any part of the core. In this way it can be used to build a diverse array of transactional applications. This talk will examine Oscar and the techniques it employs for deep customisation. Further, common patterns of robust e-commerce applications will be examined.

http://pl.pycon.org/2014/pl/agenda
